subtitle: First N minutes range normalized by volatility.

measures.how_to_read: > 1.0 large opening range day; < 0.5 quiet open.

assistant_hints: Extreme opening ranges often imply volatile/choppy sessions.
Combine with open gap and momentum for robustness.
Compute after the window completes (no lookahead).
